required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Immunogenicity and Safety of MenACWY in Infants (6 & 12 Months)
clinical_study.official_title: A Phase 2, Partially Randomized, Open Label, Multicenter Study to Evaluate the Safety and Immunogenicity After One or Two Doses of Novartis (Formerly Chiron) Meningococcal ACWY Conjugate Vaccine Administered to Healthy Infants and Young Children

brief_summary.textblock: To assess the immunogenicity of Novartis (formerly Chiron) Meningococcal ACWY conjugate vaccine (MenACWY) when administered as a two-dose schedule at 6 and 12 months of age.

primary_outcome.measure: Percentage of Subjects With hSBA Titers ≥1:4 Against Each of 4 Meningococcal Serogroups After MenACWY-CRM Vaccination Administered as 2-Dose or 1-Dose Schedule
primary_outcome.time_frame: Before and 1 month after 2-dose or 1-dose schedule
primary_outcome.description: Immunogenicity was measured as the percentage of subjects with hSBA titers ≥1:4 against meningococcal serogroups A, C, W and Y, evaluated by serum bactericidal assay using human complement (hSBA), before vaccination and 1 month after 2-dose schedule of MenACWY-CRM administered at 6 and 12 months of age (MenACWY-CRM_6-12 M group) or 1-dose schedule administered at 12 months (MenACWY-CRM_12 M group)

secondary_outcome.measure: Geometric Mean hSBA Titers Against Each of 4 Meningococcal Serogroups After MenACWY-CRM Vaccination Administered as 2-Dose or 1-Dose Schedule
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Before and 1 month after 2-dose or 1-dose schedule
secondary_outcome.description: The immune response was measured as the hSBA geometric mean titers (GMTs) against meningococcal serogroups A, C, W and Y, before vaccination and 1 month after 2-dose schedule of MenACWY-CRM administered at 6 and 12 months of age (MenACWY-CRM_6-12 M group) or 1-dose schedule administered at 12 months of age (MenACWY-CRM_12 M group)

secondary_outcome.measure: Percentage of Subjects With hSBA Titers ≥1:8 Against Each of 4 Meningococcal Serogroups After MenACWY-CRM Vaccination Administered as 2-Dose or 1-Dose Schedule
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Before and 1 month after 2-dose or 1-dose schedule
secondary_outcome.description: Immunogenicity was measured as the percentage of subjects with hSBA titers ≥1:8 against meningococcal serogroups A, C, W and Y, before vaccination and 1 month after 2-dose schedule of MenACWY-CRM administered at 6 and 12 months of age (MenACWY-CRM_6-12 M group) or 1-dose schedule administered at 12 months of age (MenACWY-CRM_12 M)

secondary_outcome.measure: Percentage of Subjects With hSBA Titers ≥1:4 or ≥1:8 Against Meningococcal Serogroup C After One Vaccination of MenC-CRM Administered at 12 Months of Age
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Before and 1 month after MenC-CRM vaccination at 12 months
secondary_outcome.description: Immunogenicity was measured as the percentage of subjects who achieved hSBA titers ≥1:4 or ≥1:8 against meningococcal serogroup C, before and 1 month after one vaccination of MenC-CRM administered concomitantly with Prevnar at 12 months of age

secondary_outcome.measure: Geometric Mean hSBA Titers Against Meningococcal Serogroup C After One Vaccination of MenC-CRM Administered at 12 Months of Age
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Before and 1 month after MenC-CRM vaccination at 12 months
secondary_outcome.description: The immune response was measured as the hSBA GMT against meningococcal serogroup C, before and 1 month after one vaccination of MenC-CRM administered concomitantly with Prevnar at 12 months of age

secondary_outcome.measure: Percentage of Subjects With hSBA Titers ≥1:4 or ≥1:8 Against Meningococcal Serogroup A, W and Y After One Vaccination of MenACWY-CRM Administered at 18 Months of Age
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Before and 1 month after MenACWY-CRM vaccination at 18 months
secondary_outcome.description: Immunogenicity was measured as the percentage of subjects who achieved hSBA titers ≥1:4 or ≥1:8 against meningococcal serogroups A, W and Y, before and 1 month after one vaccination of MenACWY-CRM administered concomitantly with Pentacel at 18 months of age

secondary_outcome.measure: hSBA GMTs Against Meningococcal Serogroups A, W and Y After One Vaccination of MenACWY-CRM Administered at 18 Months of Age
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Before and 1 month after MenACWY-CRM vaccination at 18 months
secondary_outcome.description: The immune response was measured as the hSBA GMTs against meningococcal serogroups A, W and Y, before and 1 month after one vaccination of MenACWY-CRM administered concomitantly with Pentacel at 18 months of age

secondary_outcome.measure: Percentage of Subjects With hSBA Titers ≥1:4 or ≥1:8 Against Meningococcal Serogroup C After MenACWY-CRM Vaccination Administered at 18 Months of Age, Following One Vaccination of MenC-CRM at 12 Months of Age
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Before and 1 month after MenACWY-CRM vaccination at 18 months
secondary_outcome.description: Booster response was measured as the percentage of subjects who achieved hSBA titers ≥1:4 or ≥1:8 against meningococcal serogroup C, before and 1 month after MenACWY-CRM vaccination administered at 18 months of age, following one vaccination of MenC-CRM at 12 months of age

secondary_outcome.measure: hSBA GMT Against Meningococcal Serogroup C After MenACWY-CRM Vaccination Administered at 18 Months of Age, Following One Vaccination of MenC-CRM at 12 Months of Age
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Before and 1 month after MenACWY-CRM vaccination at 18 months
secondary_outcome.description: Booster response was measured as the hSBA GMT against meningococcal serogroup C, before and 1 month after MenACWY-CRM vaccination administered at 18 months of age, following one vaccination of MenC-CRM at 12 months of age

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of Subjects Who Reported Solicited Local and Systemic Reactions After Any MenACWY-CRM, MenC-CRM and Concomitant Vaccination
secondary_outcome.time_frame: From day 1 through day 7 after any vaccination
secondary_outcome.description: The safety was assessed as the number of subjects who reported solicited local and systemic reactions from day 1 through day 7 following any vaccination of MenACWY-CRM, MenC-CRM and concomitant vaccination

arm_group.description: Subjects received 2 doses of MenACWY-CRM (1 dose at 6 and 12 months of age). Subjects also received routine vaccines: 2 doses of PC7 (1 dose at 6 and 12 months of age), 1 dose of DTaP-Hib-IPV (at 6 months of age) and 1 dose of MMR+Varicella (at 13 months of age)

Subjects received 1 dose of MenACWY-CRM at 12 months of age. Subjects also received routine vaccines: 2 doses of PC7 (1 dose at 6 and 12 months of age), 1 dose of DTaP-Hib-IPV (at 6 months of age) and 1 dose of MMR+Varicella (at 13 months of age)

Subjects received 1 dose of MenC-CRM (at 12 months of age) and 1 dose of MenACWY-CRM (at 18 months of age). Subjects also received routine vaccines: 1 dose of PCV7 (at 12 months), MMR+Varicella (at 13 months) and DTaP-Hib-IPV (at 18 months)

intervention.description: Subjects received the full dose (0.5 mL) of MenACWY-CRM, obtained by extemporaneous mixing of lyophilized MenA powder component and the MenCWY suspension, administered by IM injection into the anterolateral area of the right thigh.
One dose (0.5 mL) of MenC-CRM was obtained by extemporaneous mixing just before injection of the lyophilized MenC component and a saline solvent, administered by IM injection into the arm region.

intervention.other_name: Combined vaccine containing diphtheria, tetanus, pertussis, Haemophilus influenzae type B and inactivated polio virus; Pentacel

intervention.description: One dose (0.5 mL) of PC7, supplied in pre-filled syringe, administered by IM injection into the anterolateral area of the left thigh.

facility.name: Children's Hospital of Eastern Ontario Research Institute
Clinical Trials Research Center, Department of Pediatrics, Dalhousie University, IWK Health Center

participant_flow.recruitment_details: Subjects were enrolled at three sites in Canada.
participant_flow.pre_assignment_details: All enrolled subjects were included in the study.

group.title: MenACWY-CRM_6-12 M
group.description: Subjects received 2 doses of MenACWY-CRM (1 dose at 6 and 12 months of age). Subjects also received routine vaccines: 2 doses of PC7 (1 dose at 6 and 12 months of age), 1 dose of DTaP-Hib-IPV (at 6 months of age) and 1 dose of MMR+Varicella (at 13 months of age).

group.title: MenACWY-CRM_12 M
group.description: Subjects received 1 dose of MenACWY-CRM at 12 months of age. Subjects also received routine vaccines: 2 doses of PC7 (1 dose at 6 and 12 months of age), 1 dose of DTaP-Hib-IPV (at 6 months of age) and 1 dose of MMR+Varicella (at 13 months of age).

group.title: MenC-CRM_12 M_MenACWY-CRM_18 M
group.description: Subjects received 1 dose of MenC-CRM (at 12 months of age) and 1 dose of MenACWY-CRM (at 18 months of age). Subjects also received routine vaccines: 1 dose of PCV7 (at 12 months), MMR+Varicella (at 13 months) and DTaP-Hib-IPV (at 18 months).

baseline.population: Analysis was done for all enrolled subjects.

group.title: MenACWY-CRM_6-12 M
group.description: Subjects received 2 doses of MenACWY-CRM at 6 and 12 months of age. Subjects also received routine vaccines: 2 doses of PC7 (at 6 and 12 months) and 1 dose each of DTaP-Hib-IPV (at 6 months) and MMR+Varicella (at 13 months).

group.title: MenACWY-CRM_12 M
group.description: Subjects received 1 dose of MenACWY-CRM at 12 months of age. Subjects also received routine vaccines: 2 doses of PC7 (at 6 and 12 months) and 1 dose each of DTaP-Hib-IPV (at 6 months) and MMR+Varicella (at 13 months).

group.title: MenC-CRM_12 M_MenACWY-CRM_18 M
group.description: Subjects received 1 dose each of MenC-CRM (at 12 months) and MenACWY-CRM (at 12 months). Subjects also received routine vaccines: 1 dose each of PC7 (at 12 months), MMR+Varicella (at 13 months) and DTaP-Hib-IPV (at 18 months).

group.title: Total
group.description: Total of all reporting groups

outcome.title: Percentage of Subjects With hSBA Titers ≥1:4 Against Each of 4 Meningococcal Serogroups After MenACWY-CRM Vaccination Administered as 2-Dose or 1-Dose Schedule
outcome.description: Immunogenicity was measured as the percentage of subjects with hSBA titers ≥1:4 against meningococcal serogroups A, C, W and Y, evaluated by serum bactericidal assay using human complement (hSBA), before vaccination and 1 month after 2-dose schedule of MenACWY-CRM administered at 6 and 12 months of age (MenACWY-CRM_6-12 M group) or 1-dose schedule administered at 12 months (MenACWY-CRM_12 M group)
outcome.time_frame: Before and 1 month after 2-dose or 1-dose schedule
outcome.population: Analysis was done on per protocol (PP) population, i.e subjects in the exposed population who received all the relevant doses of vaccines correctly; and provided evaluable serum samples at the relevant time points; and had no major protocol violation as defined prior to unblinding.

group.title: MenACWY-CRM_6-12 M
group.description: Subjects received 2 doses of MenACWY-CRM at 6 and 12 months of age. Subjects also received routine vaccines: 2 doses of PC7 (at 6 and 12 months) and 1 dose each of DTaP-Hib-IPV (at 6 months) and MMR+Varicella (at 13 months).

group.description: Subjects received 1 dose of MenACWY-CRM at 12 months of age. Subjects also received routine vaccines: 2 doses of PC7 (at 6 and 12 months) and 1 dose each of DTaP-Hib-IPV (at 6 months) and MMR+Varicella (at 13 months).

measure.title: Percentage of Subjects With hSBA Titers ≥1:4 Against Each of 4 Meningococcal Serogroups After MenACWY-CRM Vaccination Administered as 2-Dose or 1-Dose Schedule
measure.description: Immunogenicity was measured as the percentage of subjects with hSBA titers ≥1:4 against meningococcal serogroups A, C, W and Y, evaluated by serum bactericidal assay using human complement (hSBA), before vaccination and 1 month after 2-dose schedule of MenACWY-CRM administered at 6 and 12 months of age (MenACWY-CRM_6-12 M group) or 1-dose schedule administered at 12 months (MenACWY-CRM_12 M group)
measure.population: Analysis was done on per protocol (PP) population, i.e subjects in the exposed population who received all the relevant doses of vaccines correctly; and provided evaluable serum samples at the relevant time points; and had no major protocol violation as defined prior to unblinding.

outcome.description: The immune response was measured as the hSBA geometric mean titers (GMTs) against meningococcal serogroups A, C, W and Y, before vaccination and 1 month after 2-dose schedule of MenACWY-CRM administered at 6 and 12 months of age (MenACWY-CRM_6-12 M group) or 1-dose schedule administered at 12 months of age (MenACWY-CRM_12 M group)
outcome.time_frame: Before and 1 month after 2-dose or 1-dose schedule
outcome.population: Analysis was done on PP population.

measure.description: The immune response was measured as the hSBA GMTs against meningococcal serogroups A, W and Y, before and 1 month after one vaccination of MenACWY-CRM administered concomitantly with Pentacel at 18 months of age

outcome.description: Booster response was measured as the percentage of subjects who achieved hSBA titers ≥1:4 or ≥1:8 against meningococcal serogroup C, before and 1 month after MenACWY-CRM vaccination administered at 18 months of age, following one vaccination of MenC-CRM at 12 months of age
outcome.time_frame: Before and 1 month after MenACWY-CRM vaccination at 18 months
outcome.population: Analysis was done on PP population.

group.title: MenC-CRM_12 M_MenACWY-CRM_18 M
group.description: Subjects received 1 dose each of MenC-CRM (at 12 months) and MenACWY-CRM (at 12 months). Subjects also received routine vaccines: 1 dose each of PC7 (at 12 months), MMR+Varicella (at 13 months) and DTaP-Hib-IPV (at 18 months).

measure.description: Booster response was measured as the percentage of subjects who achieved hSBA titers ≥1:4 or ≥1:8 against meningococcal serogroup C, before and 1 month after MenACWY-CRM vaccination administered at 18 months of age, following one vaccination of MenC-CRM at 12 months of age
measure.population: Analysis was done on PP population.

outcome.title: hSBA GMT Against Meningococcal Serogroup C After MenACWY-CRM Vaccination Administered at 18 Months of Age, Following One Vaccination of MenC-CRM at 12 Months of Age
outcome.description: Booster response was measured as the hSBA GMT against meningococcal serogroup C, before and 1 month after MenACWY-CRM vaccination administered at 18 months of age, following one vaccination of MenC-CRM at 12 months of age
outcome.time_frame: Before and 1 month after MenACWY-CRM vaccination at 18 months
outcome.population: Analysis was done on PP population.

group.title: MenC-CRM_12 M_MenACWY-CRM_18 M
group.description: Subjects received 1 dose each of MenC-CRM (at 12 months) and MenACWY-CRM (at 12 months). Subjects also received routine vaccines: 1 dose each of PC7 (at 12 months), MMR+Varicella (at 13 months) and DTaP-Hib-IPV (at 18 months).

measure.title: hSBA GMT Against Meningococcal Serogroup C After MenACWY-CRM Vaccination Administered at 18 Months of Age, Following One Vaccination of MenC-CRM at 12 Months of Age
measure.description: Booster response was measured as the hSBA GMT against meningococcal serogroup C, before and 1 month after MenACWY-CRM vaccination administered at 18 months of age, following one vaccination of MenC-CRM at 12 months of age
measure.population: Analysis was done on PP population.

outcome.title: Number of Subjects Who Reported Solicited Local and Systemic Reactions After Any MenACWY-CRM, MenC-CRM and Concomitant Vaccination
outcome.description: The safety was assessed as the number of subjects who reported solicited local and systemic reactions from day 1 through day 7 following any vaccination of MenACWY-CRM, MenC-CRM and concomitant vaccination
outcome.time_frame: From day 1 through day 7 after any vaccination
outcome.population: Analysis was done on the safety population, i.e. all subjects who had at least one vaccination and some postbaseline safety data.

group.title: MenACWY-CRM_6-12 M
group.description: Subjects received 2 doses of MenACWY-CRM at 6 and 12 months of age. Subjects also received routine vaccines: 2 doses of PC7 (at 6 and 12 months) and 1 dose each of DTaP-Hib-IPV (at 6 months) and MMR+Varicella (at 13 months).

group.description: Subjects received 1 dose of MenACWY-CRM at 12 months of age. Subjects also received routine vaccines: 2 doses of PC7 (at 6 and 12 months) and 1 dose each of DTaP-Hib-IPV (at 6 months) and MMR+Varicella (at 13 months).

group.description: Subjects received 1 dose each of MenC-CRM (at 12 months) and MenACWY-CRM (at 12 months). Subjects also received routine vaccines: 1 dose each of PC7 (at 12 months), MMR+Varicella (at 13 months) and DTaP-Hib-IPV (at 18 months).

measure.title: Number of Subjects Who Reported Solicited Local and Systemic Reactions After Any MenACWY-CRM, MenC-CRM and Concomitant Vaccination
measure.description: The safety was assessed as the number of subjects who reported solicited local and systemic reactions from day 1 through day 7 following any vaccination of MenACWY-CRM, MenC-CRM and concomitant vaccination
measure.population: Analysis was done on the safety population, i.e. all subjects who had at least one vaccination and some postbaseline safety data.

reported_events.time_frame: Serious adverse events (SAEs) were reported throughout the study (day 1 through day 336)

group.title: MenACWY-CRM_6-12M
group.description: Subjects received 2 doses of MenACWY-CRM at 6 and 12 months of age. Subjects also received routine vaccines: 2 doses of PC7 (at 6 and 12 months) and 1 dose each of DTaP-Hib-IPV (at 6 months) and MMR+Varicella (at 13 months)

group.title: MenACWY-CRM_12M
group.description: Subjects received 1 dose of MenACWY-CRM at 12 months of age. Subjects also received routine vaccines: 2 doses of PC7 (at 6 and 12 months) and 1 dose each of DTaP-Hib-IPV (at 6 months) and MMR+Varicella (at 13 months)

group.title: MenC-CRM_12M_MenACWY-CRM_18M
group.description: Subjects received 1 dose each of MenC-CRM (at 12 months) and MenACWY-CRM (at 12 months). Subjects also received routine vaccines: 1 dose each of PC7 (at 12 months), MMR+Varicella (at 13 months) and DTaP-Hib- IPV (at 18 months)

certain_agreements.pi_employee: Principal Investigators are NOT employed by the organization sponsoring the study.
certain_agreements.restrictive_agreement: The terms and conditions of Novartis' agreements with its investigators may vary. However, Novartis does not prohibit any investigators from publishing. Any publications from a single site are postponed until the publication of the pool data (i.e., data from all sites) in the clinical trial.
